title: Wall Street Breakfast April 21: Meta Platforms Slides
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Meta Platforms slides as firm's checks say current quarter slowing worse than Q1. Netflix stock plummeted following earnings announcement. How much? Tesla's Elon Musk talks new robotaxi vehicle, higher prices and deliveries growth on conference call.
content:encoded: Meta Platforms slides as firm's checks say current quarter slowing worse than Q1. Netflix stock plummeted following earnings announcement. How much? Tesla's Elon Musk talks new robotaxi vehicle, higher prices and deliveries growth on conference call.
